content.question: Suppose the government sets a price floor at $9 in the market. The resulting consumer surplus, producer surplus, and deadweight loss will be which of the following?

choices.label: Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss B + E C + F A + B
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss A + B C + D E + F
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss A C + D + F E
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss A + B + E C + D + F 0
Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss A B + C + D E + F

content.answer: Consumer Surplus Producer Surplus Deadweight Loss A B + C + D E + F

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
